pullRequest.title: Fixes issue where Unix crashes when inotify is full
pullRequest.bodyText: Previously, the program was crashing for Unix users when inotify had reached its max file limit. Since the only way to fix this seems to be to close applications or to edit privileged system files, the proposed solution is to notify the user of the issue and give them the option of continuing usage of the application. Fixes #6073
